title: OSVR Server Config
description: This schema documents and guides creation of a config file for the osvr_server application.

externalDevices.title: External devices object
externalDevices.description: Contains entries defining path tree names and device descriptors for external VRPN devices

additionalProperties.title: External device definition
additionalProperties.description: Describes an external device. The key associated with this object is the path it will be accessible under.

deviceName.title: Device name
deviceName.description: For example, Tracker0 - the part preceding @ in the full VRPN device name.

server.title: Device server
server.description: Server host (IP address or hostname), optionally with port if not the default 3883

descriptor.title: Device descriptor
descriptor.description: TODO - can either be an embedded descriptor object, or a reference to an external file with the descriptor.

local.description: Whether the server should be local-only or shared (open to networks)

interface.description: Network interface (IP address) to listen on - implies a non-local-only server

port.description: Port to listen on - note that a non-default port may impair the ability of client applications to contact the server!

routes.title: DEPRECATED - Route specifications
routes.description: Deprecated way to specify aliases, or as they were known earlier, routes. Replaced fully by aliases.

plugins.title: Plugins to manually load
plugins.description: Manual-load plugins that should be loaded. Provide plugin name only, not filename.

display.title: Display descriptor - TODO - filename, reference, or object

aliases.title: Aliases - TODO
aliases.description: Aliases to manually add to the path tree, optionally with transforms. These take the same format as automatic aliases, so they should share a schema.
